products.title: Vitra Blackout Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Make the most of your space and keep your windows unfussy with the smart and versatile style of the vitra blackout cream roller blind. This well designed blind will accentuate a range of schemes thanks to the gentle cream colourway. This neutral toned fabric is bright and uplifting yet the blackout coating offers effective privacy and light exclusion. Product id: sdb-rbx0526 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes vitra blackout cream roller blind in cream.
